hits.definition:
难 (F 難)

[nán] difficult

[nàn] disaster

数 (F 數)

[shù] number, number, figure, fate, plan;

    数学 shùxué math

[shǔ] count, enumerate, list

[shuò] frequently, repeatedly

表

[biǎo] show, list, table, form, meter, (F 錶) (wrist-) watch

车 (F 車)

[chē] car, vehicle with wheels, <family name>

[jū] (a piece in Chinese chess)

{Compare with 东 dōng east}

应 (F 應)

[yīng] promise, answer, respond, <family name>, (= 应该 yīnggāi) should, ought to

[yìng] 应用 yìngyòng apply

路

[lù] path, way, journey, distance, means, sequence, logic, sort, grade, class, <family name>, (= 道路 dàolù) road

死

[sǐ] die, death
